definition: surname Mi/name of an ancient state
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Indeed, he’s helpful to the field as a provacteur.
sentences.chinese: 事实上，作为”密探“的他对别人是很有帮助的。

sentences.english: Did I mention these I'm a good-trained secret agent?
sentences.chinese: 我提到我是个培训锻炼锻炼有素的密探了吗？

sentences.english: The spy dodged with the lady.
Are you a police spy, sir?
The spy is onto us,we'd better hide.
sentences.chinese: 密探发现我们了，我们最好还是躲起来。

sentences.english: "The time is short, Evremonde, " said the Spy, in a warning voice.
sentences.chinese: “时间不多了，埃佛瑞蒙德，”密探用警告的口气说。

sentences.english: The Spy withdrew, and Carton seated himself at the table, resting his forehead on his hands.
sentences.chinese: 密探走了，卡尔顿在桌边坐了下来，额头落在双手上。

sentences.english: "Was He a spy?" asked Mr. Cruncher.
Did I mention that I'm a well-trained secret agent?
sentences.chinese: 我提到我是个训练有素的密探了吗？

sentences.english: Did I mention that I'm a well-trained secret agent?
sentences.chinese: 我提到我是个练习有素的密探了吗？

sentences.english: Passepartout found himself beside the detective; but he did not talk to him.
sentences.chinese: 路路通坐在密探费克斯旁边，但是他不跟费克斯说话。

sentences.english: We-- we've got our spies in there.
She thinks you are all spies for her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她以为你们全是她丈夫的密探。

sentences.english: He thinks ice cream vendors are secret agents.
sentences.chinese: 竟然认为冰激淋小贩都是密探。

sentences.english: Sir Percival's spies were not going to lose sight of me.
sentences.chinese: 珀西瓦尔爵士的密探一直在监视我的行踪。

definition: intelligence gatherer/spy/detective/scout/sound (medical instrument)/long and narrow probing and sampling utensil
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
defense of the imperial palace or of the capital/the palace guard (or a member of that unit)
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
submerged piles installed to prevent the passage of boats/(fig.) informer/spy
